content: Yes, you can use honey in a homemade hair mask for color-treated hair. Honey contains natural enzymes and antioxidants that can nourish and strengthen hair. It also has antibacterial properties that can help heal a dry, itchy scalp. However, it is important to note that honey may lighten hair, so it may not be suitable for darker hair colors. It is always recommended to do a patch test before applying any new hair product or treatment.
